content: 추가적 업데이트가 밈에들고 게임이 이쁨. 그러나 게임의 난이도가 매우 어려움 그만큼 조작에 익숙해 질수록 재밌는 게임. 앞으로의 업데이트와 개발에 따라 기대가 되는 게임.
Controls aren't responsive and camera view isn't the best also not worth a paid game
Controls are eh
Very difficult
Loved paying this with a controller on a pc or console. But using a touchscreen, not so much.
Could be good. Needs work
The game it only drifting upon drifting which would be nice to play quickly but the controls are hard to master and there's not much to do other than beat all the worlds

Cool game. Physics are a little exaggerated, but like most driving apps for your phone, the controls are a pain. Not free, but for the coupla bucks, it is still a good value. Now just to get a hold of the steering...

SPINN SPINN, BLAMM, KZZZZZZZ I used my flydigi wee2t for this one and I love/hate this game. Its extremely frustrating to get on how to know how to drift properly without slamming through walls and hearing that unsatisfying scratch noise. But I feel like im going to play this for a long time and its worth mastering it! Also, the overworld is big enough for you to practice your drifting skills, i am even at the world 2 and its very massive, you could practice and just roam.
Its good game...duh
You need an optional bar to tell you whether you're going too fast or slow for drift. It keeps saying I'm too fast, bit if i go slower, then the turns don't cause the car to drift.
Amazing Get It
Trash

I really like this game, and it has the potential to be one of the best. But the issues with the controls are impossible to ignore. The turn buttons have some really strange hit boxes, and I find myself hitting dead zones often. To get this game up to par, the buttons need to be consistent and adjustable. I really hope this is implemented soon, because I love what this game aims to be.

I am likely the worst drifter that has ever driven a virtual motor vehicle. I still punish myself with this game for reasons unclear. The art is great the tips are useless against my ineptitude but I appreciate the effort.

Controls are not good at all. You should be able to reposition and resize the controls. Can't comment on whether the actual drive mechanics because I'm forever missing the turn buttons on the screen. Thumstick setting only works from the one position instead of where ever you place your thumb. Considering it's a game based on fine movements, and steering over speed you'd think the devs would make it as easy as possible to hit the turn keys.
A great drift simulator with very cool physics. Controls are easy enough once you realise you can slide your finger over to the handbrake and back on to gas to initiate a drift smoothly.
My only complaint about Absolute Drift is that I paid $15 for the PS4 version and then realized the $3 mobile version is literally the exact same game and every bit as fun
Too Hard

Nice game, but it run choppy on my Pixel 2 XL, especially (but not limited to) when you have to hit the blocks and they scatter everywhere. Sometimes the car won't turn even though I'm pressing the left/right buttons. It might be nice to allow other camera views too.

The people who made this game have never drifted a car. You can set easy medium or but it isnt that simple. Easy gives you an underpowered car with 5 degrees of turning so its hard to initate a drift or counter drift. Medium is the most tame since the game has horible response times between you pushing a button and it happening. Then hard is an AWD car with 2000hp and tires from a 1970s pinto. I thought id try it even though people said the controlls were bad... They are horrible.
If I could rate it lower I would, terrible input delay as well as just overall bad performance, and it somehow managed to find a way to make drifting feel clunky and stiff and overall just not fun

Hard to learn, ridiculous to master. It takes some time to actually get all the features of the game, and the game is really really really unfun at the start. I'd say it takes about 1-2 hours of playtime to start having fun, but MY GOD is it rewarding when you get the controls. I say this keeping in mind that the tutorial is ridiculously useless and unhelpful. As lots of people have said before this game is a hard rock with gold that hasn't been mined well at all. Now stop reading this and drift

ABSOLUTE DISAPPOINTED. This game under normal circumstances would be 5 stars. However for some reason they have removed the option for manual transmission on this version which in my opinion brakes the game (no pun intended) Even if you use a Bluetooth controller you recieve no option for manual. Changed to 1 star after being asked ingame to rate, after I had already rated.
Boring the physics are not realistic an the game seems to move in slow motion... silly nothing like real life not a fun game
Waste of time, glad i got this with play pass or i would be pissed.
Broken on pixel 2
DOPE Real tricky
Pretty hard could be better for the user

As a beta tester for your company or whatever in my experience Everytime I play free roam or whatever in game everything is just blue and my game crash this really need to be fix because I like to give more feedback as a beta tester but I can't really give any good feedback unless I able to play the game in this circumstance I was unable to play the game and give you my best feedback if any dev is reading this comment please fix the bug that would be appreciated thank you
iT DOESNT WORK ON IPAD WHAT i would like to put 5 stsrs but i can t play AND IT IS KEEP KICKING ME OUT
F*@ng love it
Great game. I was concerned about the critical reviews, however I found the controls pleasant. No need for manual transmission/speedometer really.
Controls, and sliding physics take some time to get used to... but it's a fun lil game. :)
Handling sucks especially camera view

The car handling is so absurdly realistic that it is just not fun and is borderline unplayable. The camera distance, no customization, no speed meter, and bad controls make this an unenjoyable experience. It has the makings of a gold game with teh progression, world design, challenged, and unique UI, but it still could have been a lot better.
Too tough for me, but it's fun trying
It is very boring
Easy to learn hard to master
Just no...
Nice. Absolutely priced!!!!!
Meh
It's literally like driving on ice roads with wheels that have no grip. This game sucks and it does not have that satisfying drift experience. 1/5 would not reccomend for anyone
Controllers on screen are bad. It says controller support. But PS4 controller does not work with Android 9. Love this game, but it needs controller support simple.
Is a really fun game, can't stop playing it.
Great game but hard to control
Fun but just too many ads
Has ads with play pass, are you serious? Greedy dev.
I like it. But in wish there was more options on the controls
game is broken.....sad cause it looks cool.....getting refund might try ps4 version... Bluetooth controller support still not working.....
Looks fun, but would not load.
Sublime game I love it
This seems like it's a nice game but I don't understand how to actually play. The tutorial needs to be redesigned. It just tells you to do stuff and expects you to figure it out.
Challenging and fun, but keeps freezing up on me when entering an event. Just me?
The gameplay would be enjoyable if not for the controls being so small.
So good add more cars
Epic game. Hard to play with these controls. Use xbox controller.
Hard but really fun
Looks nice, but performance wise it's not ideal. Also controls are that great as well, can't really feel the car, unlike pc version.

Nice concept, but this is not a game made for mobile. This is a hard game to play, so the controls need to be well made, as well as performance, which is very dissapointing for a paid game. I have a Galaxy S6 and I have to play at the lowest quality possible to get 20fps, 30 sometimes, which is still unplayable for the game in question.
The game is good. But it lags on 2GB ram. Even on low graphics and 30 fps. Why IDK?

Genuinely my favorite game I've ever played on a phone. Once you get used to the timing and being able to slide, this game becomes a serious blast! Start on hard physics since easy mode is like trying to drift with traction control on. The physics great and the levels are fun. Was genuinely sad when there were no more levels, but I still regularly jump in and to try to beat the high scores. Highly recommended :) TL:DR - Game is amazing. Definitely a leaning curve, but so worth it!
It's a really good game it's worth what I paid for it.xb Thnx

Would totally give it a full 5 stars if it had the manual transmission option, and as slot of people are saying, if the controls were a little more responsive and having the option to customize your own button layout, the game would be just as good as it was on ps4
Looks like it could be fun but the controls are not responsive enough so the learning curve is a little too steep

Seems like it would be fun, if not for the poor controls. You can't even move or resize the touch controls (see Sonic Android ports for how to do precision touch controls right). If one guy can program configurable touch controls, a whole "studio" can. My thumbs are cramped after 5 minutes.
Too steep a learning curve on controls. Music is excellent though.
Love it on ps4 now get to love it here!
Meh.
Meh
It worth it , sike it suk
I just wish there were more levels!
I love this game except that the controls are hard to overcome if you know how drifting works. Counter-steer doesn't exist, it just ends the drift and turns the car the other way.
Not functioning Pixel 3 XL Android 10 Play Pass
great delight
Bah. What a waist

This game is great concept and is pretty fun but the lagging and control response leaves this game too agrivating to play it's an achievement based game yet I can't regularly score achievements because of the frame rate lag and control unresponsiveness and the in game tips are horrible how can I not go fast and drift I tried and the game doesn't score it as a drift this game needs work please fix it id love to see something come of this time I Invested in writing this review thank you

Great game. how does it not have HID controller support though...? huge disapointnent. Ignore the reviews that say the controls are bad, you will have a light switch moment where you just start to get it and can drift around an entire track.

Played this on PC and console, always thought it would be a great mobile game, and it is! Controls are different at first but once you get adjusted, not so bad. Definite learning curve for new people though.

Until I discovered that they left Switch Pro Controller support in this version of the app, I almost gave up since there's no X-input or D-input support and fiddling with remappers is just gross.. So I play with my 8bitdo SN30 pro+ paired to my Note 9 in switch mode and I'm having a blast!
The controls make the game not fun.

Controls are terrible, absolutely no control of the throttle, it's either 0% or 100% all the time which makes it very easy to lose control. You're also sliding 100% of the time, there's no grip whatsoever which makes drifting very difficult when trying to link turns.
Really fun game but the controls take some time to get used to.
Love it
My game is have issues
Terrible
I got this game for free and still felt ripped off. No real tutorial and I have no desire to waste hours trying to figure out basics.
Doesn't launch on pixel 3 xl android 10
Controls are tough to master, making it not fun to play.
I love Noodlecake games, but the controls on this are a hot mess. No game should be this frustrating for the first 10 minutes. That's not fun.
The game is laughable at best. I'd give no stars of I was allowed.
It's quite zen indeed
Controls are not that easy, handling is to mehh. Feels like the tracks are covered with banana skins.
Super fun
add adjustable controls :)

great game, but please creat a setting where you can reset all the open world missions. other than that amazing gameplay and awesome jdm culture!
Excellent with additional controller! (in general touch/tilt controls ain't for me)
its challenging which is great... unlike most drift game and the music is good !
It was horible the game would not load up and it was only a white screen. I cant even get a refund i suggest dont take the risk
Awesome
the game shouldn't be this hard to control

really fun - almost exactly what I was hoping for out of a drifting game. wouldn't mind a different point of view camera on the car - something just behind, instead of the helicopter type view, but that's just me. drifting seems way easier with the right point of view :P that said, really fun game. kudos to the developers!
poor controls

I just wanna start off this review to just say I noticed some real brain dead reviews asking for things like tunes and other features equally absurd for this game. For anyone who's played the original version from however many years ago it popped up on steam you'll notice the game's near similar even with it being titled "zen edition". All Im saying is that this is the same game I logged 15 or 16 hours into between my flights on my laptop just now it's on my phone

Cool game but i only gave 4 stars. i'll give 5 when creators will add some cars and let upgrade them and tune. Add some tracks and give more missions and it would be cool to get some rewards for complate missions or/and tracks. Add shop. Maybe some camera angles cause car is little bit to far for me but i love that its in 2D. And please let me set controle bottons how i like them to be. Multiplayer would be amazing. I gave you ideas, now please make people love this game. (Peace)
i open the game and it shows 2 logos and then the screen goes white and freezes
I love it.
awesome
no controller support
The best drifting game on Android, without a doubt. Will take some time getting used to, but when you do, it's going to be extremely satisfying. Totally recommend.
Takes a little bit to get used to the controls, but boy is this fun. Hoon responsibly!
Imagine driving on peanut butter. that's what this game is
These controls are a joke right?
blank screen after logo on galaxy note 4 droid 6.0.1 :(

Bit short but damn this is a fun game Wish there were more cars though And that the freeroam had night mode too Also the game seems quite heavy on resources, is it possible to give better graphics but less lag? Also, the replay data is always corrupted. Have no idea why but I'll try see if I can find out.
doesn't work on my phone ... try fixing it devs.
Just a really fun game.
Would be 4 or 5 stars but it is broken, whenever i retry a track the game crashes and closes. Very annoying bug!
good game but a little to sensitive
Great game, great physics, feeling the drift. Just could be better tutorial, explaining how to drift

Not sure if its just the kobe track just started playing but the free roam car handleing seems difgerent than the track and there like a glitchy skipping camera movement while racing which makes it pretty impossible to do a good job I even turned it on 30 fps didnt help but wish I could enjoy the game seems fun.kinda wasted money here
This game isnt supporting 2 points of contact on screen at one time cant control and accelerate at the same time.
Bad: Controls are very mushy and unresponsive. Feels like you're driving a 50cc go cart, not a car. Good: Nice color pallette, design and soundtrack.
I've been waiting for this game to come to Android go ever! It's finally here!
Awesome game...even better on my android
Ve skutečném světě mužů jet konstantní rychlostí, v této hře lze pouze zrychlovat nebo zpomalovat. Ovládání tedy kazí dojem z jinak povedené hry.

controls are unresponsive and please allow usb gamepad support otherwise amazing game will a change rating if usb game pad or better touch screen control game stops responding to input every 30 seconds or so
Please add support for Shield Android TV
Needs some framerate improvements on the Note 8. But very good game.
I was waiting for absolute drift on android for a long time! Now that it is here it is every bit amazing and entertaining as it was on ps4! The full absolute drift experience in my pocket!

Doesn't run too well on mid-range phones. FOV is too big even on 50, slows the graphics down a lot when in large areas. With red blocks my phone barely manages 10FPS. Without blocks graphics are still choppy :/
Works as great as it does on the PC, love it. Would be better if you could change the transmission to manual though.
